title: Optimal growth conditions to enhance Chlorella vulgaris biomass production in indoor phyto tank and quality assessment of feed and culture stock
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Turfatul Jannat Jui, Anika Tasnim, S.M. Rashadul Islam, Omar Hamza Bin Manjur, Md. Saddam Hossain, Nishat Tasnim, Debabrata Karmakar, Md. Rakibul Hasan, Md. Rezaul Karim
